Your Career Path
This FX Sales Associate role gives you direct access to the trading floor. Ebury offers a transparent and well-defined career progression program from day 1, with clear pathways to becoming either a Head of Desk or a specialised FX Dealer. At Ebury, we are a genuine meritocracy; your ambition, performance, and capability are the sole drivers of your career velocity.
This is your launchpad into the technical world of corporate FX risk management. As a FX Sales Associate, youll do more than build a client book, youll become a technical expert, consulting with the leadership of global businesses on their financial strategy. You will learn to dissect a client's currency exposure and deploy a sophisticated toolkit of hedging instruments. Your conversations will be about structuring FX solutions using both forward contracts & options, to secure future cash flows while providing robust downside protection. This is a detail-oriented sales role for those who want to master the application of financial derivatives to solve real-world business challenges.
The FX Sales Associate Role:

Drive New Business: Proactively research & identify client needs within key sectors. You will conduct in-depth analysis of prospective clients to understand their commercial requirements and pinpoint opportunities where Eburys solutions can add significant value.
Secure New Partnerships: Strategically manage a sales pipeline by scheduling and attending client meetings, often alongside senior team members, with the clear objective of closing deals and establishing new, lasting partnerships.
Develop & Present Bespoke Solutions: Articulate Eburys services to prospects and design tailored solutions to address their specific requirements across foreign exchange, risk management (hedging), payments, and trade finance.
Cultivate Lasting Client Relationships: Act as a trusted advisor by providing clients with expert market analysis and continuous updates on currency trends, thereby strengthening relationships, ensuring client retention, and increasing your overall market knowledge.

You may be a graduate with an interest in Financial Services or you may have 1-2 years of experience within a B2B sales environment. You will be someone who seizes opportunities to learn and progress and who wants to join us on the next exciting phase of our growth.
